title: health check endpoint verification
description: Verify the /health GET endpoint returns a 200 status with a JSON body containing status as 'healthy' and a valid timestamp.

title: openrouter models retrieval
description: Test the /api/openrouter/models GET endpoint to ensure it returns a list of available OpenRouter models when a valid API key is configured, and returns 404 if no API key is found.

title: openrouter api connection test
description: Validate the /api/openrouter/test-connection POST endpoint by sending a valid and invalid API key and verifying the connection test results are returned correctly.

title: openrouter generate completion
description: Test the /api/openrouter/generate POST endpoint to generate text completions using OpenRouter with required parameters prompt and model, and optional temperature and max_tokens.

title: openrouter api key save
description: Verify the /api/openrouter/api-key POST endpoint securely saves the OpenRouter API key and ensures the key is encrypted and not exposed in responses.

title: openrouter api key status check
description: Test the /api/openrouter/api-key/status GET endpoint to confirm it correctly reports whether an OpenRouter API key is configured.

title: speed test run non streaming
description: Validate the /api/speed-test/run POST endpoint to run speed tests across multiple models concurrently and return aggregated results without streaming.

title: speed test run streaming
description: Test the /api/speed-test/run-stream POST endpoint to ensure it streams partial responses in real-time using Server-Sent Events (SSE) for multiple models.

title: speed test history retrieval
description: Verify the /api/speed-test/history GET endpoint returns a paginated list of previous speed test runs with correct limit parameter handling.

title: llm providers and models management
description: Test the CRUD operations on /api/llm/providers, /api/llm/models, and related endpoints to ensure LLM providers and models can be created, retrieved, updated, and deleted as expected.
